Package controller

Class ModifyPartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ModifyPartController
  • public class ModifyPartController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is where a part can be modified and resaved back to the inventory list.

      • isStringAnInteger

        public boolean isStringAnInteger​(java.lang.String s)
        This method checks to see if changing an outsourced part to an in-house product has an integer value instead of a string.
        Parameters:
        s - - This is used to verify that when a user changes from outsourced to in-house string the value is not a string.
        Returns:
        - This returns true if it is an integer and false if it is a string.

      • isPriceNumeric

        public boolean isPriceNumeric​(java.lang.String strNum)
        Method checks to see if price text field value entered is a numeric value only.
        Parameters:
        strNum - - This string is used to verify the price is not a string value for validation purposes.
        Returns:
        - This returns true if it is a double and false if it is a string.

      • tryIntegerValue

        public boolean tryIntegerValue​(java.lang.String strNum)
        This method checks if the integer values for inventory, min, and max text fields are integers and not doubles or floats.
        Parameters:
        strNum - - This string is used to verify the value is an integer and not a double or a float for validation purposes.
        Returns:
        - This returns true if it is an integer and false if it is a double or floating point.
